sentences.en: At Zapper, we aim to deliver customer satisfaction by working towards workforce excellence.
sentences.cn: 在杰派, 我们以卓越的能力为客户提供满意的服务.

sentences.en: Biologists say implausible that onions could attract flu virus as a bug zapper traps flies.
sentences.cn: 生物学家说很难相信洋葱能像捕虫器那样吸收流感病毒.

sentences.en: However, no matter where I placed the bug zapper, we were still swarmed by mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 但是, 不管我把灭虫器放那里, 我们身边总是围满蚊子.

sentences.en: Jet was also an efficient bug - zapper and a terrific watchdog.
sentences.cn: “喷气机”还是个灭虫能手和出色的“看家狗”.

sentences.en: Zapper's dedicated team of professionals is geared and ready to assist inbusiness decisions.
sentences.cn: 杰派的专业团队时刻准备着为客户的人事决策提供帮助.

trans.tran_cn: 电子灭虫器，（电视机的）遥控器
trans.tran_en: a thing you use for changing channels on a television from a distance
